summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3421 for the improvement of Calhoun Street, from the existing sewer west of 22nd Avenue North to 19th Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42447, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
